lines: Why the Seventh Heaven, you ask? Because no one would drink in the Seventh Hell!
I also considered naming it Cloud Nine, but that felt a bit effeminate for our clientele.
...It's you! When the Crystal Braves stormed in and closed off the Rising Stones with nary an explanation, I feared the worst. I'm relieved that you are safe, at least.
You look as though you've been through the seventh hell itself, and I'd love to offer you our hospitality, but 'twould be unwise for you to linger. There's no telling who may be watching.
So the Scions have been exonerated... I'm truly happy for you, Forename. It's a shame that the Crystal Braves had to be disbanded, though. So much hope had been placed in them.
With so many people leaving, the town won't be as lively as it was before. But no matter where you and yours end up, know that you'll always have my best wishes.
The Scions have been busy making new friends of late, and the place is lively again for their presence. I must say, it warms the heart to see folk come together in common cause.

obj.n: Les petits plats dans les grands
La ballade des vainqueurs des Méandres
La ballade de l'Avancée de la Foi
